name: Once Again Asking You To Clear The Room Of Goats
name_original: Once Again Asking You To Clear The Room Of Goats
description:
Once Again Asking You To Clear The Room Of Goats

  • Click to move
  • Collide with goats to clear them from the room
  • More goats appear as the level increases

I made this game in about 3 hours :P

Hope you enjoy playing it!
